pages.text: Your tools with this enchantment seem to dissolve all things they mine into thin air. Broken down into the finest sand and blown away by the wind.$(br2)When you want to knock half a city out of rough stone, it might even come in handy. Some things are probably a curse and a blessing at the same time.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Destroys the drops of all broken blocks.$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br)Applicable to mining tools.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a $(item)common Book$() with Curse of the Void by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.
